sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { Button } from "../ButtonElement"; import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, BtnWrap, ImgWrap, Img, } from "./InfoElments"; const InfoSection = ({lightBg,lightText,id,imgStart,topLine,headLine,darkText,description,buttonLable,img,alt,dark}) => { return ( <> {topLine} {headLine} {description} ); }; export default InfoSection;
